entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 40 km/h diminishing to 20 early this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 46 in the evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023
